Name: Mango Vodka Martini
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of skewered dried mango strip.
Review: Full-on mango fruit. A " Martini " in so much that it's made with vodka and vermouth.
History: Adapted from a 1990s recipe which comprised 60ml (2oz) citrus vodka and 50ml (12⁄3oz) mango purée.
Nutrition: One serving of Mango Vodka Martini contains 176 calories
